divs: sighting detailsi was 8.5hrs into my shift as a truck driver when i saw out of my passenger window a craft moving west, at an altitude of 300-400ft (there was a storm with low cloud cover but not raining yet) down the 401 on september 22, 2010 at 1:10am. i was driving down pinebush rd after leaving my employers office. about 400ft to the right i caught out of the corner of my eye, what i thought was a helicopter with it being so low and all the big lights. there were three large bright lights 60ft apart in the shape of a triangle, with two lights about half the size\brightness in the center as well as a small red flashing light just like the ones seen on civilian aircraft. the lights seemed to create (atleast from my angle) a gold\orange haze obscuring the shape of the object. it was moving forward with the flat part of the triangle, leaving the point at the rear. turning a short distance before franklin blvd the craft pivoted the right light toward hespler, while tilting alittle in a tight 90 degree turn. the craft was now moving with the pointed part of the triangle over food basics and then over the houses vanishing out of sight. i couldn't hear anything but then again i was driving a loud big rig. i slowed my driving so i could watch it more and was amazed at how much ground it covered without appearing to be moving fast. i was excited to see this object but didn't feel the enlightening\awakening i had felt with my sighting in 1999 of a green orb. i felt up beat and good about the sighting until i got home at 4:00am, i then started to feel a little down and discouraged. i keep thinking what i saw was normal and not "out of my reality" and there for is not a big deal. then i would change my mind and think it was important and would want to find out what it was. i think i'm feeling this was because it wasn't as crazy as the green orb but either way i thought i'd let everyone know what i saw and who knows if more people come out with sightings.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around September 22nd 2010
Summary: 3 lights at each point, 2 smaller lights in the center with a smaller red blinking light. Between the lights there was a golden haze obscuring the object.
